    About Psychic Readings

    Our web site offers many ways to make choosing from among our authentic, gifted Advisors easy, and fun. Review Types of Psychic Readings and Types of Psychics for valuable information on the most important psychic specialties and types of readings. You may also find it helpful to read about ways to get a psychic reading, so you can pick the communication channel (eg telephone, online) that's most comfortable for you.

How to Rate Your Readings

Give a star rating and add a short written review after each reading to post on our website. This enables members to help each other connect with new Advisors and enjoy the best possible psychic experience.

5 stars Excellent
I will definitely choose this advisor in the future.
4 stars Very Good
I would be very likely to choose this advisor in the future.
3 stars Good
I would be likely to choose this advisor in the future.
2 stars Adequate
I would be somewhat likely to choose this advisor in the future.
1 star Unsatisfactory
I would be unlikely to choose this advisor in the future.
Tips for Writing Great Reviews

We do post negative reviews. However, we reserve the right to reject postings if they contain unsuitable material. Do not include any personal information in your review, including people's names, addresses, phone numbers, personal details, or mention of any other advisor.

Example of an Unacceptable Review:

Last week I talked to Destiny and she told me my boyfriend Bob was cheating on me with my best friend Sally. But Star told me he was in New York from November 5 to 20, so he couldn’t have been with Sally. I hope Star is right.

Example of an Acceptable Review:

Star picked up on my situation right away. I hope she’s right about my boyfriend being faithful, because a different psychic told me he was cheating. Star knew things about him that no one could possibly know, so she was able to put my mind at ease.

Only readings that lasted 3 minutes or longer are eligible for review. You have up to 3 months to rate your reading.
